title: Edu Ministry to start remedial classes on every Saturday to support needy students
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 01 (APP):Ministry of Federal Education and Professional Training has decided to introduce remedial classes on every Saturday to support students who need extra help in language and numeracy skills.
According to the Education Ministry, this initiative aims to provide additional support to students who require it, ensuring they can catch up with their peers and excel in their studies.
Sharing the key details of the initiative, the ministry said that two classes will be conducted each Saturday to focus on language and numeracy skills.
However, the initiative would provide targeted support for students who need extra help.
The objective of these remedial classes is to provide a supportive environment where students can improve their language and numeracy skills, building a strong foundation for future success.
The benefits of the initiative is to personalize attention and support for students who need it most. It will also improve language and numeracy skills and enhance academic performance and confidence.
The new decision would ensure better preparedness for future studies and careers, the ministry said.
“We are committed to ensuring every student receives the support they need to succeed. These remedial classes are just one way we are working to achieve this goal”, it added.
